H0.text: who negotiated an agreement with japan concerning the future of korea. Theodore Roosevelt

H1.text: who negotiated an agreement with japan concerning the future of korea. Elihu Root

H2.text: who negotiated an agreement with japan concerning the future of korea. William Howard Taft's Secretary of State, Philander Knox

H3.text: who negotiated an agreement with japan concerning the future of korea. Taft

A4.text: The Taft–Katsura Agreement was a discussion between William Howard Taft, then the United States Secretary of War, and Prince Katsura Tarō, the Japanese Prime Minister, on 27 July 1905.

A5.text: Taft stated that his opinions were his own, but that he believed that Roosevelt would concur.
